about.title: About me
about.description: Hello, I am Kamil and I come from Białystok. In 2020, I got interested in programming and I develop this passion to this day. I devote for learning every free moment, and because it gives me pleasure, I'd like it to become my job as well. I decided on a Front-end, because I pay attention to the appearance of websites and I like to see effects of my actions. For creating projects I use mostly React, but I always try to use something new, to learn as much as possible. I would like to work as Junior Front-end Developer.

saper.title: Saper
saper.description: My version of a popular game from the early 1980s that is probably known to everyone. There are three difficulty levels to choose, that differ in the size of the board and the number of bombs. Passing time is an additional factor.

quiz.title: Quiz
quiz.description: Fast fun about grography knowledge. This quiz is about guessing all voivodship cities in Poland. Only the names of provinces are hints.

weather.title: Weather App
weather.description: Weather application. Just enter the city and you will get basic information about the current weather.  The data come from two API

mountains.title: Mountains
mountains.description: Project of not specifying a mountain range and an information service.

portfolio.title: This portfolio site
portfolio.description: The website you are currently on. I present here my skills and finished projects.
portfolio.stack: React, Context API, Bootstrap, EmailJS, Formik, Yup, SCSS
